captions.text: Am I really your boyfriend? I’m sick
Why do you put off your feelings like homework?
Are we doing business? Or do you hate me?
Today I put a spell on you again
Looking at the same spot but so different
You’re the only one I have
But why do I feel like you’re not there
You ask me “Are you mad?” when I’m down
Have you ever done anything to make me down?
You’re cute and I’m just pathetic
Hope a miracle happens so that you love me more than I love you
But I’m so full of you
So why do I keep doing this?
Why do you make me a fool?
Who do you think I am?
Who do you think I am?
I’m so sick because of you
I’m trying to find out your real mind
All you did was sending me 2lines of text message
Is this the relationship I wanted? Dream?
Where did all the love stories go?
TV dramas don’t make any sense
I grab my hairs hundreds of times
I hear your news from your friend
I want you uh want you
You’re the criminal who shook my heart
You used me up before you got caught on fire
My efforts to win your heart do not work
I’m just a friend to you
You seem to like that more
But I’m so full of you
So why do I keep doing this?
Why do you make me a fool?
Who do you think I am?
Who do you think I am?
I’m so sick because of you

2:22 V(Kim TaeHyung Dec 30, 1995): vocal
2:58 J-Hope(Jung HoSeok Feb 18, 1994):main dancer, rapper
3:15 Suga(Min YoonGiMar 9, 1993): lead rapper

2:57 onwards is Jhope - Main dancer + Rapper
3:16 onwards is Suga - Main rapper

comments.author: Mika Wolf

comments.text:
okay so this was the first bts music video i bumped into... (AND I DO NOT 
REGRET THAT)

so this  is gonna sound like extremely weird but i thought that jungkook 
and v were twins.... NO LIKE SEIROUSLY I COULDNT TELL THE DIFFERENCE 
BETWEEN THEM I DONT GET WHY I WAS LIKE THAT BUT NOW IM OKAY SO THATS GOOD.

i wasnt exactly really hooked to the song in the beginning (thats what 
usually happens to me... there are some exceptional songs that i get hooked 
to right after the first time i hear it, but most songs need some time for 
me to get hooked to... if that even made sense...haha... ) but i was having 
a pretty good feeling about the catchy chorus part. i also loved the dance.

but like usual, i exited out of the tab and basically forgot, or at least 
tried to, forget about them because i was already so obsessed with exo (yas 
im a proud exo-l ehe).

then it got all weird. i kept on coming back to this song and then i fell 
in love with just one day and boys in luv. then i memorized all their names 
and stuff like that. and then i became an army too. AND AFDODKFJOAK ITS 
AMAZING. THEIR NEW COMEBACK IS so awesome <3

i.... to be honest... i like like a ton of different groups..... exo got me 
into kpop, really. and u dont say, i was obsessed with them for like a 
whole year until i discovered other groups. haha... ya im fickle. and thats 
not good. sigh. i need to fix my bad habits XD

these are some really talented gruops u should check out if u havent yet: 
exo, bts, big bang, b.a.p., b1a4, high4, nell, ft island (i am currently 
obsessed with them right now), winner, and soon to be coming ikon, and many 
many more. im betting that i forgot a few of my fav bands, but i will add 
on as i remember. infinite is also pretty darn awesome. <3 okay this is 
like story of my kpop life and ya its so long..................... bai!﻿

comments.text:
Guys, can you JUST stop comparing EXO with BTS? They're two FREAKING 
different companies AND group. Stop making EXO sound bad and STOP calling 
EXO's fans immature. You don't even know if that's even true or not. Who 
knows. There can be many immature people out there. I'm an EXO fan and I 
LOVE EXO. So, can you guys please stop hating and comparing EXO with BTS? 
BTS is an amazing group and so is EXO. No one is better than the other. 
Some people might like EXO, others might like another. Now, PLEASE leave 
EXO out of this. Just comment on how hot and talented BTS is, alright?﻿
